title: Dawnbringer Riven Skin Texture bug ( Wings )
body: there is a bug in dawnrbinger riven skin, look at the wings when you're moving with her, there is some kind of screen tearing in her wings

replies.body:
Hi!

Unfortunately, this is a side effect of character inking, a system we don't have a ton of control over. In order to "resolve" this issue (it's more of a workaround), you'd need to turn off character inking in your video settings. 

To show you what it looks like with v. without:

http://imgur.com/m4Rd3YG
Is this the only solution right now or are you going to be able to fix it later in a patch?
It's the only solution for the time being.
I have experienced this too. It looks like a line.
